notes: StudentTenant.com is an online platform specializing in student accommodation, connecting landlords, private halls, and letting agents with students. They operate primarily online but have physical office locations in the UK and India. They list properties on their own site as well as major portals like Zoopla, Rightmove, and OnTheMarket. Some listings include bills, and they offer a bills-inclusive package service. The company has undergone acquisition/partnership changes recently. Finding a specific key contact person proved difficult from the available search results. Company Number: 14025267 (Student Tenant Lettings Limited). Also associated with Company Number 09456136 (Student Tenant Ltd., potentially a previous or related entity). VAT Number: GB 416 5427 03. Member of The Property Ombudsman. Acquired by University Living in August 2024. Part of the Rooms4U family since April 2022.

Kevin Gaskell is also listed as a Director. The business was started in 2007 by Lynsey Gaskell, her husband, sister, and brother-in-law. Kevin and Lynsey Gaskell were previously involved with the referencing company Vouch but moved on to focus solely on Shefflets in 2020.
